entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 a.m. PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 16.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 2:00 PM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 16.8°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 43 %
Dewpoint: 4.1°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 20. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
